text: Should be implemented nationwide at All Schools: -armed resource officers -armed teachers who complete background & firearm training -metal detectors at points of entrance -surveillance cameras -no trench coat policy -clear backpacks See: Airports & Israel as examples
Absolutely. I don't think a person who refuses use a firearm to protect the children has any business being a teacher. It should be a minimum requirement, like in Israel.

Take lessons from Israel , they had one school shooting. Do you know what they did next day ? They signed bill into law that funded firearm training of teachers and even janitors and placed armed guards , since than zero shootings.

For as how long as it takes to protect our kids and give our schools and teachers fighting chance There was one school attack in Israel , you know what they did next day ? They signed bill into a law that provided teachers hell even janitors with firearm training and armed them

Those 7% of teachers should have the right to carry if they wish to do so. No one has said that all teachers have to carry a firearm. After a school shooting in Israel in 1974 teachers were allowed to have access to firearms and since then only two such shootings have occurred

we can - bring back firearm classes. TEACH responsibility. stop promoting violence in video games. turn off the ghetto music. Randomly arm teachers - look at ISRAEL. And if you really want to stop this - put # Marines in the # curriculum

Obama, his FBI, Sheriff Israel and his department have the blood of those students & teachers on their hands. Despite their criminal negligence, some teachers, administrators and staff had training, permit to conceal & carry firearm they could have minimized the deaths.

If they want to "beef up security", they should do it like Israel does. One armed security at school entrance (with EXTENSIVE firearm training). NO armed teachers. Total gun control (EXTENSIVE background checks, MANDATORY firearm training, etc.) They maintain serious protection.
